sentences.english: Eventually it puts forward the focus of studying V-based solid solution type hydrogen stora…
sentences.chinese: 指出了今后钒基固溶体型贮氢材料应用研究的重点。

sentences.english: In your opinion, what is the future of the foreign-funded bank in China?
sentences.chinese: 你认为外资银行今后在中国的发展前景如何？

sentences.english: From now on, we need to be more mobile and flexible, carefully choosing battle opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 今后，我们要更加机动灵活，精细地寻求。

sentences.english: Hope in the day of aftertime to get along with everyone delectation.
sentences.chinese: 希望在今后的日子里与大家相处愉快。

sentences.english: The warning is based on the latest 5-day weather forecasts.
sentences.chinese: 这项警报是以今后5天的天气预报资料为基础的。

sentences.english: May the years ahead of you filled with love and joy.
sentences.chinese: 祝你们今后年年月月幸福相爱。

sentences.english: This will be one of the main impetuses of China's economic development in the future .
sentences.chinese: 这将是今后中国经济发展的主要着力点之一。

sentences.english: In the following practice, abstract art and figural art become a "convenient saying ".
sentences.chinese: 在今后的实践中，“抽象和具象”就成了“方便说”。

sentences.english: Then the direction of ecological researches on Shatian pomelo is put forward.
sentences.chinese: 最后提出了今后沙田柚生态研究的方向。

sentences.english: Permanently store the new scale for future use.
sentences.chinese: 永久储存新的比额表，供今后使用。

sentences.english: He said the two sides should make full use of the joint committee on bilateral cooperation as a platform to push forward the cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 今后双方应充分利用双边联委会平台，推进新中合作。

sentences.english: It helped prepare Alan Shepard for an even greater danger in the future.
sentences.chinese: 这对于准备在今后更大的危险艾伦谢泼德。

sentences.english: At the end, prospect of the development of the hydrometallurgy of uranium is discussed briefly.
sentences.chinese: 对铀水冶科学技术的今后发展作了讨论。

sentences.english: He also said that if a similar incident occurs in the future, Japan will resolutely deal with it.
sentences.chinese: 今后如再次出现类似情况，日方将继续毅然应对。

sentences.english: The scientific and technologic innovation is the strategic decision of our nation's middle and long-term development.
sentences.chinese: 走科技创新之路是我国今后中长期的战略决策。

sentences.english: The result will provide an important evidence for the study of Khodalite lithology in the future.
sentences.chinese: 为今后黄陵地区孔兹岩系研究提供重要参考。

definition: auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to)/will (cause)/should (enable)/going to
(of systems, facilities etc) comprehensive/well-developed/excellent/to refine/to improve
a few years/several years/how many years
